response.original_title: A Baffin Vacation, Love on Ice
response.overview: Join adventures Erik and Sarah on yet another epic Baffin Vacation as they kite ski north along the remote coastline of Baffin. Over their 69 day holiday they ski mountains, climb an epic big wall, and cross a glacier in search of new rivers to white water kayak.
response.title: A Baffin Vacation, Love on Ice
